# auto-generated by grc.converter

id: fhss_utils_cf_estimate
label: Center Freq Estimation
category: '[Sandia]/FHSS Utilities'

parameters:
-   id: method
    label: Method
    dtype: int
    default: fhss_utils.RMS
    options: [fhss_utils.RMS, fhss_utils.HALF_POWER, fhss_utils.COERCE]
    option_labels: [RMS, Half-Power, Coerce Only]
-   id: channel_freqs
    label: Channel Center Frequencies
    dtype: real_vector
    default: '[]'
    hide: part

inputs:
-   domain: message
    id: in
    optional: true

outputs:
-   domain: message
    id: out
    optional: true
-   domain: message
    id: debug
    optional: true

templates:
    imports: import fhss_utils
    make: fhss_utils.cf_estimate(${method}, ${channel_freqs})
    callbacks:
    - set_freqs(${channel_freqs})
    - set_method(${method})
